organisation_identifier.name: organisation_identifier
organisation_identifier.label: organisation-identifier
organisation_identifier.hover_text:
A unique code for your organisation, which was entered when you registered with IATI. It is generated from your organisation registration agency and number.

Click here for more information

organization_country.name: organization_country
organization_country.label: Country
organization_country.hover_text: Select the country that your organisation is registered in.

organization_registration_agency.name: organization_registration_agency
organization_registration_agency.label: Organisation Registration Agency
organization_registration_agency.hover_text: Select an agency that your organisation is registered with. If you need help, please email: support@iatistandard.org

registration_number.name: registration_number
registration_number.label: Registration Number
registration_number.hover_text: Enter your organisation's registration number with the registration agency that you have selected.

iati-activity-identifier.name: organisation_identifier
iati-activity-identifier.label: organisation-identifier
iati-activity-identifier.hover_text: The organisation identifier is a unique code for your organisation, which is generated from your organisation registration agency and number.

name.name: name
name.label: name
name.hover_text: The name of the organisation that data is being published about.

narrative.name: narrative
narrative.label: narrative
narrative.hover_text: Enter the organisation's name. This can be repeated in multiple languages.

lang.name: language
lang.label: language
lang.help_text: If no language is selected, your default language is assumed.

reporting_org.name: reporting_org
reporting_org.label: reporting organisation
reporting_org.hover_text:
The organisation that is publishing data. If a primary reporter, the organisation is publishing data about itself. If a secondary reporter, it is publishing on the activities of another organisation.

Click here for more information

ref.name: ref
ref.label: reference
ref.hover_text: Provide your organisation's IATI identifier. This was entered when you registered with IATI.

type.name: type
type.label: type
type.hover_text: Select the type that best describes your organisation.

secondary_reporter.name: secondary_reporter
secondary_reporter.label: secondary-reporter
secondary_reporter.hover_text: If you are publishing data about your own organisation, select 'False'. If you are publishing data about another organisation, and are not officially assigned to report on its behalf, select 'True'.

narrative.name: narrative
narrative.label: name
narrative.hover_text: Enter your organisation's name. This can be repeated in multiple languages.

lang.name: language
lang.label: language
lang.help_text: If no language is selected, your default language is assumed.

total_budget.name: total_budget
total_budget.label: total budget
total_budget.hover_text:
Provide your organisation’s total expected development and humanitarian spend for the current and (where possible) following three years. Budgets should preferably be entered for each three month (quarter) period. Budget time periods should not overlap or cover a period of more than twelve months.

Click here for more information

status.name: total_budget_status
status.label: status
status.hover_text:
Select a status that best describes this budget:

(1) indicative - a non-binding estimate for the described budget.

(2) committed - a binding agreement for the described budget.

If no status is selected, the budget is assumed to be indicative.

period_start.name: period_start
period_start.label: period-start
period_start.hover_text: Enter the start date of the budget period.

period_end.name: period_end
period_end.label: period-end
period_end.hover_text: Enter the end date of the budget period. This cannot be greater than one year from the start date.

value.name: value
value.label: value
value.hover_text: The total value of the organisation’s budget for this period.

currency.name: currency
currency.label: currency
currency.help_text: If no currency is selected, your default currency is assumed.

value_date.name: value_date
value_date.label: value-date
value_date.hover_text: The date used to determine the exchange rate for currency conversions.

budget_line.name: budget_line
budget_line.label: budget line
budget_line.hover_text: You can provide further information in budget lines. Budget lines allow the total budget to be broken down, for example, into different projects happening in the same year. The sum of budget lines does not have to equal the total budget.

ref.name: ref
ref.label: reference
ref.hover_text: You can provide a reference that you use to identify this budget line in your organisation’s financial reporting system.

value.name: value
value.label: value
value.hover_text: Provide the sub-total for this budget.

currency.name: currency
currency.label: currency
currency.help_text: If no currency is selected, your default currency is assumed.

value_date.name: value_date
value_date.label: value-date
value_date.hover_text: The date used to determine the exchange rate for currency conversions.

narrative.name: narrative
narrative.label: narrative
narrative.hover_text: Provide a description for this budget line.

lang.name: language
lang.label: language
lang.help_text: If no language is selected, your default language is assumed.

recipient_org_budget.name: recipient_org_budget
recipient_org_budget.label: recipient organisation budget
recipient_org_budget.hover_text:
You can provide forward-looking budgets for each institution which receives core funding from your organisation.

Click here for more information

status.name: status
status.label: status
status.hover_text:
Select a status that best describes this budget:

(1) indicative - a non-binding estimate for the described budget.

(2) committed - a binding agreement for the described budget.

If no status is selected, the budget is assumed to be indicative.

recipient_org.name: recipient_org
recipient_org.label: recipient organisation
recipient_org.hover_text: Provide information about the organisation that will receive the funds.

ref.name: ref
ref.label: reference
ref.hover_text:
Enter the organisation’s IATI organisation identifier. If you cannot provide an identifier then you must provide the name of the organisation.

Click here for information on how to find other organisations' identifiers.

narrative.name: narrative
narrative.label: narrative
narrative.hover_text: Enter the name of the organisation. This can be repeated in multiple languages.

lang.name: language
lang.label: language
lang.help_text: If no language is selected, your default language is assumed.

period_start.name: period_start
period_start.label: period-start
period_start.hover_text: Enter the start date of the budget period.

period_end.name: period_end
period_end.label: period-end
period_end.hover_text: Enter the end date of the budget period. This cannot be greater than one year from the start date.

value.name: value
value.label: value
value.hover_text: The total amount of money budgeted for the recipient organisation during this time period.

currency.name: currency
currency.label: currency
currency.help_text: If no currency is selected, your default currency is assumed.

value_date.name: value_date
value_date.label: value-date
value_date.hover_text: The date used to determine the exchange rate for currency conversions.

budget_line.name: budget_line
budget_line.label: budget line
budget_line.hover_text: You can provide further information in budget lines. Budget lines allow the recipient organisation budget to be broken down, for example, into different projects happening in the same year. The sum of budget lines does not have to equal the total recipient organisation budget.

ref.name: ref
ref.label: reference
ref.hover_text: You can provide a reference that you use to identify this budget line in your organisation’s financial reporting system.

value.name: value
value.label: value
value.hover_text: Provide the sub-total for this budget.

currency.name: currency
currency.label: currency
currency.help_text: If no currency is selected, your default currency is assumed.

value_date.name: value_date
value_date.label: value-date
value_date.hover_text: The date used to determine the exchange rate for currency conversions.

narrative.name: narrative
narrative.label: narrative
narrative.hover_text: Provide a description for this budget line.

lang.name: language
lang.label: language
lang.help_text: If no language is selected, your default language is assumed.

recipient_region_budget.name: recipient_region_budget
recipient_region_budget.label: recipient region budget
recipient_region_budget.hover_text:
You can provide forward-looking budgets for particular regions that your organisation operates in. These should be in addition to, or instead of, country-specific budgets.

Click here for more information

status.name: status
status.label: status
status.hover_text:
Select a status that best describes this budget:

(1) indicative - a non-binding estimate for the described budget.

(2) committed - a binding agreement for the described budget.

If no status is selected, the budget is assumed to be indicative.

recipient_region.name: recipient_region
recipient_region.label: recipient region
recipient_region.hover_text: The geographic region where funds have been allocated.

vocabulary.name: region_vocabulary
vocabulary.label: vocabulary
vocabulary.hover_text:
You can select regions from the 'OECD DAC', 'UN' or your own internal codelist. IATI recommends that you use the 'OECD DAC' codelist. If you do not choose an option, then the codelist 'OECD DAC' is assumed.

Click here for more information on these codelists.

oecd_region_code.name: region_code
oecd_region_code.label: code
oecd_region_code.hover_text: Select the region benefitting from this budget. If vocabulary ‘99 - Reporting Organisation' has been selected, enter a code from your own region list.

region_code.name: code
region_code.label: code
region_code.hover_text: Select the region benefitting from this budget. If vocabulary ‘99 - Reporting Organisation' has been selected, enter a code from your own region list.

vocabulary-uri.name: vocabulary_uri
vocabulary-uri.label: vocabulary-uri
vocabulary-uri.hover_text: If you have selected the vocabulary ‘99 - Reporting Organisation’, provide the URI where this internal list is defined.

narrative.name: narrative
narrative.label: narrative
narrative.hover_text: Add an optional name or description of the region benefitting from the activity.

lang.name: language
lang.label: language
lang.help_text: If no language is selected, your default language is assumed.

period_start.name: period_start
period_start.label: period-start
period_start.hover_text: Enter the start date of the budget period.

period_end.name: period_end
period_end.label: period-end
period_end.hover_text: Enter the end date of the budget period. This must not be greater than one year from the start date.

value.name: value
value.label: value
value.hover_text: The total amount of money budgeted for this recipient region during the time period.

currency.name: currency
currency.label: currency
currency.help_text: If no currency is selected, your default currency is assumed.

value_date.name: value_date
value_date.label: value-date
value_date.hover_text: The date used to determine the exchange rate for currency conversions.

budget_line.name: budget_line
budget_line.label: budget line
budget_line.hover_text: You can provide further information in budget lines. Budget lines allow the recipient region budget to be broken down, for example, into different projects happening in the same year. The sum of budget lines does not have to equal the total recipient region budget.

ref.name: ref
ref.label: reference
ref.hover_text: You can provide a reference that you use to identify this budget line in your organisation’s internal financial management system.

value.name: value
value.label: value
value.hover_text: Provide the sub-total for this budget.

currency.name: currency
currency.label: currency
currency.help_text: If no currency is selected, your default currency is assumed.

value_date.name: value_date
value_date.label: value-date
value_date.hover_text: The date used to determine the exchange rate for currency conversions.

narrative.name: narrative
narrative.label: narrative
narrative.hover_text: Provide a description for this budget line.

lang.name: language
lang.label: language
lang.help_text: If no language is selected, your default language is assumed.

recipient_country_budget.name: recipient_country_budget
recipient_country_budget.label: recipient country budget
recipient_country_budget.hover_text:
You can provide forward-looking budgets for particular countries that your organisation operates in.

Click here for more information

status.name: status
status.label: status
status.hover_text:
Select a status that best describes this budget:

(1) indicative - a non-binding estimate for the described budget.

(2) committed - a binding agreement for the described budget.

If no status is selected, the budget is assumed to be indicative.

recipient_country.name: recipient_country
recipient_country.label: recipient country
recipient_country.hover_text: The country where funds have been allocated.

code.name: code
code.label: code
code.hover_text: Select the country benefitting from this budget.

narrative.name: narrative
narrative.label: narrative
narrative.hover_text: Add an optional name or description of the country benefitting from the activity.

lang.name: language
lang.label: language
lang.help_text: If no language is selected, your default language is assumed.

period_start.name: period_start
period_start.label: period-start
period_start.hover_text: Enter the start date of the budget period.

period_end.name: period_end
period_end.label: period-end
period_end.hover_text: Enter the end date of the budget period. This must not be greater than one year from the start date.

value.name: value
value.label: value
value.hover_text: The total amount of money budgeted for this recipient country during the time period.

currency.name: currency
currency.label: currency
currency.help_text: If no currency is selected, your default currency is assumed.

value_date.name: value_date
value_date.label: value-date
value_date.hover_text: The date used to determine the exchange rate for currency conversions.

budget_line.name: budget_line
budget_line.label: budget line
budget_line.hover_text: You can provide further information in budget lines. Budget lines allow the recipient country budget to be broken down, for example, into different projects happening in the same year. The sum of budget lines does not have to equal the total recipient country budget.

ref.name: ref
ref.label: reference
ref.hover_text: You can provide a reference that you use to identify this budget line in your organisation’s internal financial management system.

value.name: value

value.hover_text: Provide the sub-total for this budget.

currency.label: currency
currency.help_text: If no currency is selected, your default currency is assumed.

value_date.name: value_date
value_date.label: value-date

narrative.name: narrative
narrative.label: narrative
narrative.hover_text: Provide a description for this budget line.

lang.name: language
lang.label: language
lang.help_text: If no language is selected, your default language is assumed.

total_expenditure.name: total_expenditure
total_expenditure.label: total expenditure
total_expenditure.hover_text:
You can provide information on your organisation's past spending on humanitarian and development work. This is known as ‘total expenditure’ and IATI recommends, where possible, that your organisation reports its total expenditure for each of the past three years. An expenditure period must not be longer than one year.

Click here for more information

period_start.name: period_start
period_start.label: period-start
period_start.hover_text: Enter the start date of the expenditure period.

period_end.name: period_end
period_end.label: period-end
period_end.hover_text: Enter the end date of the expenditure period. This must not be greater than one year from the start date.

value.name: value
value.label: value
value.hover_text: The total value of your organisation’s humanitarian and development expenditure for this period.

currency.name: currency
currency.label: currency
currency.help_text: If no currency is selected, your default currency is assumed.

value_date.name: value_date
value_date.label: value-date
value_date.hover_text: The date used to determine the exchange rate for currency conversions.

expense_line.name: expense_line
expense_line.label: expense line
expense_line.hover_text: You can provide further information by breaking your organisation’s expenditure down into expense line(s). The sum of expense lines does not have to equal the total value of expenditure.

ref.name: ref
ref.label: reference
ref.hover_text: You can provide a reference that you use to identify this expense in your organisation’s financial reporting system.

value.name: value
value.label: value
value.hover_text: Provide the sub-total for this expense line.

currency.name: currency
currency.label: currency
currency.help_text: If no currency is selected, your default currency is assumed.

value_date.name: value_date
value_date.label: value-date
value_date.hover_text: The date used to determine the exchange rate for currency conversions.

narrative.name: narrative
narrative.label: narrative
narrative.hover_text: Provide a description for this expense line.

lang.name: language
lang.label: language
lang.help_text: If no language is selected, your default language is assumed.

document_link.name: document_link
document_link.label: document-link
document_link.hover_text:
A link to an online, publicly accessible, web page or document. For example, you could provide a link to your organisation’s annual report or a work plan for a particular country. Create additional document elements for each separate document.

Click here for more information

url.name: url
url.label: url
url.hover_text: A link to where the document is available online - e.g. 'http://www.example.org/doc.odt'

format.name: format
format.label: format
format.hover_text: Select the document file format from the drop-down list. For example, a PDF file could be 'application/pdf'.

title.name: title
title.label: title
title.hover_text: A short title for the document.

narrative.name: narrative
narrative.label: narrative
narrative.hover_text: Provide a short title for the document or webpage.

lang.name: language
lang.label: language
lang.help_text: If no language is selected, your default language is assumed.

category.name: category
category.label: Category
category.hover_text: A category that describes the type of document. You can select multiple categories.

code.name: code
code.label: code
code.hover_text: Select a category from the drop-down menu that describes what your document is.

description.name: description
description.label: Description
description.hover_text: A description of the document contents, or guidance on where to access relevant information.

narrative.name: narrative
narrative.label: narrative
narrative.hover_text: Provide a short description of the document or webpage, including any instructions on where to find relevant information.

lang.name: language
lang.label: language
lang.help_text: If no language is selected, your default language is assumed.

language.name: language
language.label: Language
language.hover_text: Select the language that the document is written in. This can be repeated to describe multilingual documents.

document_date.name: document_date
document_date.label: document date
document_date.hover_text: The publication date of the document or webpage.

date.name: date
date.label: date
date.hover_text: Provide the date of publication for the document, or the date that it was last updated.

recipient_country.name: recipient_country
recipient_country.label: recipient country
recipient_country.hover_text: If a recipient country is the focus of this document or webpage, you can specify it here. You can state more than one country.

code.name: code
code.label: code
code.hover_text: Select the recipient country that is the focus for this document or webpage.

narrative.name: narrative
narrative.label: narrative
narrative.hover_text: Add an optional name or description of the country.

lang.name: language
lang.label: language
lang.help_text: If no language is selected, your default language is assumed.
